title: Alison Brie
summary: Alison Brie Schermerhorn (born December 29, 1982) is an American actress, writer, and producer. She had her breakthrough for portraying Trudy Campbell in the drama series Mad Men (2007–2015), which won her a Screen Actors Guild Award in 2009. She gained further prominence for her role as Annie Edison in the comedy series Community (2009–2015). Her notable work also includes Diane Nguyen in the animated comedy series BoJack Horseman (2014–2020) and Ruth Wilder in the comedy-drama series GLOW (2017–2019). For the latter, Brie received two Golden Globe Award nominations.
